Install from CRAN:

```R
install.packages("httpgd")
```

Or install the development version from GitHub:

```R
remotes::install_github("nx10/httpgd")
```

## System requirements

- R &geq; 4.2
- See also: [`unigd` system requirements](https://nx10.dev/unigd/articles/a00_installation.html#system-requirements)
